bibl.title: Un discorso inedito di Procopio di Gaza: In Meletis et Antoninae Nuptias. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Offers the editio princeps with an Italian translation of the Procopius of Gaza's "Epithalamium for Meles and Antonina" from the ms. Athon. Mon. Dion. 347 (3881 Lambros). Really interesting and original is the description, in the proem, of the primordial world, most likely a paraphrase of the Empedoclean cosmogony. See in part. pp. 52-54: refers to P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 (= M.-P.3 356.11; LDAB 824).
bibl.seg: AMATO Eugenio, Un discorso inedito di Procopio di Gaza: In Meletis et Antoninae Nuptias. Avec résumé en anglais.
Revue des études tardo-antiques 1 (2011-2012) pp. 15-69, 1 arbre généal., 4 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://recherche.univ-montp3.fr/ret/ >.]

Offers the editio princeps with an Italian translation of the Procopius of Gaza's "Epithalamium for Meles and Antonina" from the ms. Athon. Mon. Dion. 347 (3881 Lambros). Really interesting and original is the description, in the proem, of the primordial world, most likely a paraphrase of the Empedoclean cosmogony. See in part. pp. 52-54: refers to P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 (= M.-P.3 356.11; LDAB 824).
